item.description:
The Fourth Polynesian Pounce!
November 3rd at the Midway!

http://www.facebook.com/events/463802096965581/LABRETTA

SUEDE AND THE MOTEL 6!
They'll be doing two special surfy, exotic, jungly sets that they're learning just for the Pounce!


DJ TRASH ONLY will once again be filling yer ears with all sorts of surf, exotica and hawaiian goodies in between sets!

Mode Merr will be back again with the famous 20 dollar bargain bins!
Luci will be peddling' all sorts of tiki-themed goodies!

Better arrive hungry!
BBQ from Papa Johnny and Mama Lisa...
Eat this: BBQ Pulled Pork, BBQ Chicken Wings, BBQ Baked Beans, Collard Greens, Macaroni Salad, Potato Salad and Corn Bread!

Tiki Drinks! Vendors! BBQ! Hawaiian, surf and exotica music!
Wear yer best Hawaiian garb!

10 bucks gets ya in! 21 plus. 8pm Door.
item.name: The Fourth Polynesian Pounce! November 3rd at the Midway!
